Logic AnalyzerÂ¶

The logic analyzer is a way of seeing what the FPGA is actually doing. It is a piece of the FPGA code that stands somewhat apart from the rest of the code, and is able to “watch” what’s going on, almost as if each channel were plugged into a scope.
